name: VALID8 Financial
description: Valid8 Financial offers financial services investigations by extracting and reconciling banking transactions from any PDF statement. The company was founded in 2017 by Tod McDonald and Chris McCall and is headquartered in Seattle, Washington.
one_liner: Valid8 Financial offers financial services investigations by extracting and reconciling banking transactions from any PDF statement. The company was founded in 2017 by Tod McDonald and Chris McCall and is headquartered in Seattle, Washington.
